page.title: 18A FUTURE FOR MOFFAT
page.content: The future of Upper Annandale in general and Moffat in particular is undoubtedly linked to a thriving tourist industry which has its origins in the 1800's.Sadly,however,that selfsame tourist industry has other lasting,less positive effects on the town.Once large families lived and worked in the town.Now many young people are forced to leave the town in search of Further Education or fulltime employment.Many never return or do so only to visit relatives.Many of those who remain have seasonal work at best or unemployment at worst as their only prospects.A high proportion of the population are elderly or retired.A future without tourism? Unthinkable.Employment,without altering the town's character? Improbable.A fine dilemma!
